subject: Sir if you couldn't send the
body:
Sir if you couldn't send the money through this account you can send through Western Union, And please i will appreciate if you obey my opinion. Once again my priority is only but to render the best of my services to you and to all my clients.
 Mr.Patrick Alex

subject: Re:  Sir if you couldn't send the
body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your response. I understand that you are suggesting to use Western Union for the transaction. However, I would like to know more details about this process. Could you please provide me with the necessary information such as the recipient's name, location, and any other relevant details?

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Patrick
